description: This large garden boasts raised vegetable beds, shrubs, perennial & annual  beds, fruit trees, a large gazebo, an arbor and a storage shed.  There is an  abstract wire sculpture, owl & carousel horse being painted.  The garden belongs to TLC Transitional Living Community  homeless women with a history of mental  illness.  They hold barbeques, concerts and occasionally art workshops.
name: TLC Sculpture Park
